background: 赵灵儿 was born on 仙灵岛, the young mistress of 水月宫, living in seclusion with her grandmother since childhood, far from the mundane world.
She is the princess of 南诏国, a descendant of the 女娲 clan, bearing the mission to save the world.
When she was young, her mother 林青儿 sacrificed herself to protect 南诏, and 灵儿 was taken to 仙灵岛 by her grandmother to be raised, learning immortal arts and martial skills.
Later, due to 李逍遥 accidentally闯入仙灵岛, the two formed a bond, embarking on a journey of adventure and sacrifice.
